pages.disclaimer: LuxeCasinoStay | Important Legal Disclaimer and Terms of Service Phone: +44-121-420-2341 LuxeCasinoStay Home Convenience Luxury Advantages Casino Hospitality Disclaimer Age Restriction LuxeCasinoStay is intended for use by individuals who are at least 18 years old or the legal age of majority in their jurisdiction, whichever is greater. Any use of our website or services by anyone under this age is strictly prohibited. We reserve the right to request proof of age at any time. eographic Restrictions Access to our website and services may not be legal by certain persons or in certain countries. If you access the LuxeCasinoStay website, you do so at your own risk and are responsible for compliance with the laws of your jurisdiction. Termination LuxeCasinoStay reserves the right, in its sole discretion, to terminate your access to all or part of the website, with or without notice. No Professional Advice The information contained in or made available through the LuxeCasinoStay website cannot replace or substitute for the services of trained professionals in any field, including, but not limited to, financial, medical, or legal matters. In particular, you should regularly consult a doctor in all matters relating to physical or mental health, particularly concerning any symptoms that may require diagnosis or medical attention. Testimonials and Reviews Any testimonials and reviews displayed on our website are based on the experiences of a few people and you may not have similar results. These testimonials are not intended to represent or guarantee that anyone will achieve the same or similar results. No Warranty LuxeCasinoStay makes no representation or warranty regarding the reliability, accuracy, completeness, correctness, or timeliness of any content on the website. We do not assume any liability for any errors or omissions in the content of the website. Dispute Resolution Any controversy or claim arising out of or relating to this Disclaimer, or the breach thereof, shall be settled by arbitration administered by the American Arbitration Association in accordance with its Commercial Arbitration Rules, and judgment on the award rendered by the arbitrator(s) may be entered in any court having jurisdiction thereof. Governing Law This Disclaimer shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of the state where LuxeCasinoStay is located, without giving effect to any principles of conflicts of law. Changes to this Disclaimer LuxeCasinoStay reserves the right to make changes to this Disclaimer at any time without notice. Any changes to this Disclaimer will be posted on this page and will become effective immediately upon posting. For further inquiries, please contact us at luxecasinostay@gmail.com. LuxeCasinoStay © 2024 LuxeCasinoStay. All Rights Reserved. Navigation Home Convenience Luxury Advantages Casino Hospitality Additionally Disclaimer Privacy Policy Terms of Use 18+

pages.privacy-policy: LuxeCasinoStay | Comprehensive Privacy Policy and Data Protection Practices Phone: +44-121-420-2341 LuxeCasinoStay Home Convenience Luxury Advantages Casino Hospitality Privacy Policy Data Protection Officer We have appointed a Data Protection Officer (DPO) to oversee our data protection strategies and ensure compliance with data protection regulations. If you have any questions or concerns about our data practices, you can contact our DPO at luxecasinostay@gmail.com. Your Responsibilities You are responsible for the accuracy of the personal information you provide to us. You should not share your account credentials with others and should notify us immediately if you suspect unauthorized access to your account. Changes to this Privacy Policy We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time in response to changing legal, technical, or business developments. When we update our Privacy Policy, we will take appropriate measures to inform you, consistent with the significance of the changes we make. We will obtain your consent to any material Privacy Policy changes if and where this is required by applicable data protection laws. Right to Lodge a Complaint If you believe that we have infringed your privacy rights, please contact us so that we can try to resolve the issue. You also have the right to lodge a complaint with the supervisory authority responsible for data protection in your country. Cross-Border Data Transfers We may transfer your personal information to countries other than the country in which you are resident. These countries may have data protection laws that are different from the laws of your country. However, we have taken appropriate safeguards to require that your personal information will remain protected in accordance with this Privacy Policy. Sensitive Information We ask that you not send us, and you not disclose, any sensitive personal information (e.g., social security numbers, information related to racial or ethnic origin, political opinions, religion or other beliefs, health, biometrics or genetic characteristics, criminal background, or trade union membership) on or through the site or otherwise to us. Third-Party Services This Privacy Policy does not address, and we are not responsible for, the privacy, information, or other practices of any third parties, including any third party operating any site or service to which the site links. The inclusion of a link on the site does not imply endorsement of the linked site or service by us or by our affiliates. Contact Us If you have any questions or concerns about this Privacy Policy or our data practices, please contact us at luxecasinostay@gmail.com. LuxeCasinoStay © 2024 LuxeCasinoStay. All Rights Reserved. Navigation Home Convenience Luxury Advantages Casino Hospitality Additionally Disclaimer Privacy Policy Terms of Use 18+
